data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: As the Third Task comes to a close, Harry and Cedric agree to touch the Triwizard Trophy at the same instant, thus closing the Task with a draw between the two of them. The ____, ____, ____ a Portkey, ____ transports Harry and Cedric to a graveyard. As a mysterious ____ approaches ____ boys ____ something, Harry's ____ pains ____ so ____ that ____ drops ____ wand. The approaching person kills Cedric, and binds Harry to a nearby gravestone.
data.partBlankContent: As the Third Task comes to a close, Harry and Cedric agree to touch the Triwizard Trophy at the same instant, thus closing the Task with a draw between the two of them. The tro___, how____, i_ a Portkey, wh___ transports Harry and Cedric to a graveyard. data.fullContent: As the Third Task comes to a close, Harry and Cedric agree to touch the Triwizard Trophy at the same instant, thus closing the Task with a draw between the two of them. The trophy, however, is a Portkey, which transports Harry and Cedric to a graveyard. As a mysterious figure approaches the boys carrying something, Harry's scar pains him so greatly that he drops his wand. The approaching person kills Cedric, and binds Harry to a nearby gravestone.
data.answer: 当第三个任务接近尾声时，哈利和塞德里克同意在同一时刻触摸三强争霸赛的奖杯，这样他们两人就以平局结束了任务。然而，这个奖杯是一个门钥匙，它把哈利和塞德里克送进了墓地。当一个神秘的身影走近男孩们，手里拿着什么东西时，哈利的伤疤疼得厉害，他扔掉了魔杖。走近的人杀死了塞德里克，把哈利绑在附近的墓碑上。
